general_advisory: Dry weather may prevail over the district of Puri for the next five days. Farmers are advised to irrigate their fields as there is a mildly dry condition. Specific crop management practices are provided for various crops.

advisory: To manage stem borer in paddy, use Trichogramma japonicum card @ 1/acre weekly for 6 times.
To manage stem rot in groundnut, drench soil with Validamycin 3% L.
To prevent red rot disease, select resistant varieties.
To manage powdery mildew disease, spray Sulphur 80% WP.
To manage powdery mildew disease, spray Hexaconazole 5% E.C.
To control cut worm, spray Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5 % E.C.
For controlling mites in chilli, spray Ethion 50 % EC.
To control aphid, spray neem oil formulation or Flonicam as needed.
To manage purple blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight, spray Mancozeb 75% WP.
To control black spot disease in Rose, spray Copper Oxy-chloride 50% WP.
Maintain water depth up to 6 ft for fish hibernating in the warmer bottom zone.
